rules.title: Designated Parking
rules.description: Each unit is allotted one designated parking space. Please park only in your assigned spot.

rules.title: Visitor Parking
rules.description: Visitors must use the designated visitor parking area. Overnight visitor parking requires prior approval from the Common Committee.

rules.title: Two-Wheeler Parking
rules.description: Two-wheelers should be parked in the designated two-wheeler parking zone only.

rules.title: No Blocking
rules.description: Do not block other vehicles or common pathways. Vehicles causing obstruction may be towed at the owner's expense.

rules.title: Reporting Issues
rules.description: Report maintenance issues via MyGate. Use the community WhatsApp group or reach out to the Facility Manager directly only for urgent matters.

rules.title: Interior Modifications
rules.description: Any structural modifications to your unit require prior written approval from your respective block association. The complex has four blocks and four associations.

rules.title: Noise & Civil Work Restrictions
rules.description: No noise-producing work is allowed between 2:00 PM and 4:00 PM. Civil work is not permitted on Sundays and public holidays.

rules.title: Visitor Registration
rules.description: All visitors must register at the security gate with valid identification. Residents should inform security in advance about expected visitors.

rules.title: Visiting Hours
rules.description: Visitors are welcome between 7:00 AM and 10:00 PM. Overnight guests should be registered with the management office.

rules.title: Delivery Personnel
rules.description: Delivery personnel are allowed entry only to the ground floor lobby. Residents should collect their deliveries from the lobby area.

rules.title: Cleanliness
rules.description: Please keep common areas clean. Do not leave personal belongings in corridors, stairways, or lobbies.

rules.title: Children's Play Area
rules.description: Children under 10 must be supervised by an adult in the play area. Equipment should be used responsibly.

rules.title: Segregation
rules.description: All waste must be segregated into wet (green bin) and dry (blue bin) categories before disposal.

rules.title: Collection Times
rules.description: Waste collection happens daily between 7:00 AM and 9:00 AM. Please keep your segregated waste ready for collection.

rules.title: E-Waste & Hazardous
rules.description: E-waste and hazardous materials should not be mixed with regular waste. Contact the management office for special disposal arrangements.
